```{r readdata, echo=FALSE}
#file.choose()
climate_data = read.csv("/home/CAMPUS/ocma2018/olivia_chicagomidway_data.csv") 
strDates <- as.character(climate_data$DATE)
climate_data$NewDate <- as.Date(strDates, "%Y-%m-%d")
```


## Create graphic

I created a new section for the plotting, then could "echo=FALSE" the other section since it works... :-)

```{r plotdailydata}
plot(TMAX~NewDate, data=climate_data, ty='l')

# Create linear Model
TMAX.lm = lm(TMAX ~ DATE, data=climate_data)

slopeintercept = coef(TMAX.lm)
abline(coef(TMAX.lm))
```
